Array: How did you find this place?
You're keeping Duke Aventry in this world against his will.
You don't STEAL my JOURNAL and BARGE in here making DEMANDS!!
The magic object keeping him tethered. Where is it?
THE <color=magic>LOCKET</color> IS MINE AND MINE ALONE!!!
Have you met her before? She doesn't seem to like you very much.
ENOUGH! There will be no mercy for you this time, you will pay with your life!
It's okay, Romaya. Just give us the locket and we'll be on our way.
(Insolent FOOLS with their powers they DIDN'T EARN barging in here FOILING my plans...)
And tell Duke Aventry that he's FIRED! Understood?
My lady, why are you so angry all the time? You know, in my village-
Ex-CUSE me? Who do you think you ARE?
Greetings adventurers, seek you passage across these waters?
Then show me your colored flame, or leave this place in shame!
I shall take you to the entrance.
I shall take you to the  <color=location>Flooded Graveyard</color>.
The Locket you got. To the Duke I shall take you lot.
